title: Calories added to energy class sensors
description: Starting from Home Assistant 2024.10 calories have been added to the units of measurement in the energy sensor class. Typically, these sensors measure heat energy, water heating, food energy, or human energy expenditure.

frontMatter.author: Sergey Dudanov
frontMatter.title: Calories added to energy class sensors
